content: after bemoaning the fact i can never get my yarn cakes to be/stay neat i quickly whipped up the perfect solution the simplest yarn cozie with worsted yarn and an engaging stitch pattern this yarn cozie will work up fast so you can neaten up your yarn and cast on your next project **yarn/yardage ** samples were knit with i love this cotton 100% cotton 153 yards per 85 grams in the spunky and pink teal and orange print colorways any 25 grams of dk to worsted weight yarn will do **gauge ** 6 stitches per inch in 3x2 rib **needles ** us 7 4 5mm circular needle or dpns for in the round knitting **notions ** scissors yarn needle
